title: 枪械mod 右键武器制作箱闪退
author: SMdid
txt_content:
[04:00:56] [Client thread/FATAL]: Reported exception thrown!

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
先检查一下Flan版本是否和扩展包版本一致（到官网去看，一般访问正常）
然后把crash-report发过来
